Posts.Content: Hi i was sent to my Breast. Clinic to have my lump checked out,they did a mammogram i then had a biopsy,and that doctor was 90% certain i had C, he was very upfront about it,and 10 days later it was confirmed to me,when i went back to see him xx
Posts.Title: Do docs play down cancer until they get biopsy results or can they...

Posts.Content: Hi i was sent by my doctor to my breast care clinic,they did a mammogram,then a biopsy,they told me they were 90% sure i had breast cancer,and withon 10 days i knew for certain,so yes my docs were very upfront about it,which i appreciated.
